== Kiralur (627742) ==

Kiralur is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 290 hectares and harbouring 545 households with total population of 2261 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kunnamkulam]] is at a distance of 11 km. Male population is 1140 and female population is 1121. Scheduled Caste Population is 566 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 627742<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
